entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of rain or snow mixed with drizzle beginning before morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 early this evening then light later this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow mixed with drizzle ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
